(:action secure
  ; Secure a resource and ensure its protection
  :parameters (?entity - object ?agent - person)
  :precondition (and 
                 (not (secured ?entity))
                 (has-authorization ?agent ?entity))
  :effect (secured ?entity)
)

(:action break
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?target - entity ?method - tool ?privilege - level ?system - system)
    :precondition (and
                    (secured ?system)
                    (not (broken ?target))
                    (authorization ?actor ?system))
    :effect (and
                (broken ?target)
                (access-granted ?actor ?method)
                (privilege-elevated ?actor ?privilege))

(:action learn
    ; Learn a specific skill based on its category
    :parameters (?npc - person ?skill - skill ?category - skill-category)
    :precondition (and
                    (not (knows ?npc ?skill))
                    (belongs-to ?skill ?category))
    :effect (knows ?npc ?skill)
)
